sense.def:
Kadar vojaki
subdue a group of people
, s silo vzpostavijo nadzor nad skupino ljudi.

seg.quote: Troops were sent to subdue the rebels.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
subdues someone's feelings
, deluje na čustva nekega človeka tako, da so ta manj močna.

seg.quote: This thought subdued my delight at the news.
